364170.name: Albedo: Original Soundtrack
364170.description:
The Albedo Soundtrack includes 8 tracks from Albedo: Eyes from Outer Space

Contents from this pack can be found in your Steam game directory under Soundtrack.

Tracks include:
Track 1 - Menu - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 2 - Intro Part 1 - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 3 - Intro Part 2 - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 4 - Drama 1 - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 5 - Drama 2 - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 6 - Drama 3 - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 7 - Drama 4 - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
Track 8 - End - Massimiliano "Max" di Fraia
364170.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 法语
